articles.title: Jaadu Is BACK! Hrithik Roshan, Preity Zinta's Koi Mil Gaya Is All Set To Return To Theatres After 20 Years - Times Now
articles.description: Hrithik Roshan and Preity Zinta starrer Koi...Mil Gaya is all set to re-release after 20 years on August 4 and will run in theatres till August 8. The film will complete its 20 years on August 8. Details inside!
